attr.title: MEZZER
attr.desc: MEZZER is a brutal and bloody game about slicing your foes in half. Play against your buddy in Versus mode, or test your skills against an onslaught of relentless bots in Solo mode. MEZZER is for 1-2 players and is local-multiplayer.
attr.inst: Download Mezzer.exe from https://danieldavis.itch.io/mezzer and place it in /ports/mezzer
